entry.title: Proposal: MultiBit as default desktop client on bitcoin.org
entry.summary: The conversation between Jeff Garzik and Alex Kravets highlights the need for two different sections on a web page - one for nerds and one for non-nerds. The discussion emphasizes that while developers may find it easy to comprehend new technological terms and concepts, the general public does not have the same attention span or desire to learn. Jeff Garzik recommends Bitcoin Wallet for Android as a decentralized client with network sync that is fast and easy to use. The conversation underscores the importance of making technology accessible to everyone, regardless of their level of technical expertise.
